TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Stack`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class Stack(Of T) Implements ICollection, IEnumerable(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class Stack : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::ICollection
type Stack<'T> = class interface seq<'T> interface ICollection interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T> interface IEnumerable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 指定堆疊中項目的類型。

span.span: Specifies the type of elements in the stack.

summary.span: 表示相同特定類型之執行個體的各種大小後進先出 (LIFO) 集合。

span.span: Represents a variable size last-in-first-out (LIFO) collection of instances of the same specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會實作為陣列。 is implemented as an array. 堆疊和佇列時很有用的資訊; 需暫存儲存體也就是當您可能想要擷取其值之後捨棄項目。Stacks and queues are useful when you need temporary storage for information; that is, when you might want to discard an element after retrieving its value. 使用如果您需要存取相同的順序，將它儲存在集合中的資訊。Use if you need to access the information in the same order that it is stored in the collection. 使用如果您要以相反順序存取的資訊。Use if you need to access the information in reverse order. 使用和類型時，您需要從多個執行緒同時存取集合。Use the and types when you need to access the collection from multiple threads concurrently. 常見用法是在呼叫其他程序的期間保留變數的狀態。A common use for is to preserve variable states during calls to other procedures. 三個主要的作業可對和其項目：Three main operations can be performed on a and its elements: - 在頂端插入的項目。 inserts an element at the top of the . - 從頂端移除項目。 removes an element from the top of the . - 傳回的項目是在頂端但不會移除從。 returns an element that is at the top of the but does not remove it from the . 營運是的項目數可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 如果堆疊中的容量少於是 o （1） 的作業。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加，以容納新的項目，會變成 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 是 o （1） 的作業。 is an O(1) operation. 接受`null`參考有效的值類型，並允許重複的項目。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/vb/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公用靜態 ( Visual Basic 中) 的這種類型的成員都是安全執行緒。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 不保證任何執行個體成員是安全執行緒。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: A可支援多個讀取器同時，只要不修改集合。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 即便如此，透過集合列舉是本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 這個建構函式是 o （1） 的作業。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範這個建構函式，以及數種方法的泛型類別。The following code example demonstrates this constructor and several methods of the generic class. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是的項目數，可以保存。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 當項目新增至，自動增加容量的要求以重新配置內部陣列。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估計集合的大小，指定初始容量，就不需要執行數項調整大小作業新增項目時。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 藉由呼叫，您可以減少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 將元素複製到在相同的順序，而在讀取的集合。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the of the collection. 這個建構函式是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是中的項目數`collection`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `collection`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範這個建構函式，以及數種方法的泛型類別。The following code example demonstrates this constructor and several methods of the generic class. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是設為零，並且從項目集合中的其他物件的參考也釋出。 is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released. 容量會維持不變。The capacity remains unchanged. 若要重設的容量，呼叫。To reset the capacity of the , call . 修剪空白設定的容量預設容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會判斷使用的預設相等比較子的相等針對`T`，清單中值的類型。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the list. 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. span.span: Copies the to an existing one-dimensional , starting at the specified array index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將元素複製到陣列中後進先出 (LIFO) 順序，將連續的呼叫所傳回的項目順序類似。The elements are copied onto the array in last-in-first-out (LIFO) order, similar to the order of the elements returned by a succession of calls to . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/vb/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得 中所包含的項目數。

span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 營運是的項目數，可以儲存。The capacity of the is the number of elements that the can store. 是實際的項目數。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量永遠是大於或等於。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果超過容量加入元素時，會自動將舊的項目複製並加入新項目之前，重新配置內部陣列增加容量。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範數個屬性和方法泛型類別，包括屬性。The following code example demonstrates several properties and methods of the generic class, including the property. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. summary.span: 傳回 的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範是可列舉的泛型類別。The following code example demonstrates that the generic class is enumerable. `foreach`陳述式 (`For Each` Visual Basic 中`for each`c + + 中) 用來列舉佇列。The `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++) is used to enumerate the queue. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會實作為陣列。 is implemented as an array. 如果已等於容量的容量會加上自動重新配置內部的陣列，並加入新項目之前，現有的項目會複製到新陣列。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果型別`T`是參考型別`null`可以推入至做為預留位置，如有需要。If type `T` is a reference type, `null` can be pushed onto the as a placeholder, if needed. 它所佔用的位置堆疊中，就會被視為任何物件。It occupies a slot in the stack and is treated like any object. 如果堆疊中的容量少於是 o （1） 的作業。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an O(1) operation. 如果容量需要增加，以容納新的項目，會變成 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. summary.span: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the collection.
An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果來源的類型無法自動轉換成目的地類型`array`，實作非泛型擲回，而泛型實作擲回。If the type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination `array`, the non-generic implementations of throw , whereas the generic implementations throw . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is .

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示對 的存取是否同步 (安全執行緒)。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果 的存取為同步 (安全執行緒)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的預設實作中，這個屬性一律會傳回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 在少數情況下，列舉會嘗試寫入存取，您必須鎖定在整個列舉期間的集合。In the rare case where enumerations contend with write accesses, you must lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 傳回的物件，可用來同步存取。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步處理是所有執行緒存取集合之前都鎖定這個物件時，才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 擷取這個屬性的值是一種 O(1) 運算。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也會將列舉值帶回至這個位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值會將永久失效，而且下次呼叫或是就會擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 這個方法是 o （1） 作業。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T[] ToArray() cil managed

summary.span: 複製 至新陣列。

span.span: Copies the to a new array.

returns.span: 新陣列，包含 之元素的複本。

span.span: A new array containing copies of the elements of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將元素複製到陣列中後進先出 (LIFO) 順序，將連續的呼叫所傳回的項目順序類似。The elements are copied onto the array in last-in-first-out (LIFO) order, similar to the order of the elements returned by a succession of calls to . 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種方法泛型類別，包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 在程式碼範例會一堆字串建立的預設容量，並使用推送至堆疊的五個字串的方法。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 列舉的堆疊項目，這不會變更堆疊的狀態。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用來顯示堆疊中取出的第一個字串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用來在堆疊上，查看下一個項目，然後方法用來顯示。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用來建立陣列，並將堆疊項目複製到它，則陣列傳遞至建構函式，建立一份堆疊項目的順序反轉。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 複製的項目會顯示。The elements of the copy are displayed. 兩次的堆疊大小建立陣列，而方法用來複製開始之陣列中介的陣列項目。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 反轉元素順序與建立堆疊的複本一次使用建構函式; 因此，三個 null 項目結尾。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用來顯示"four"的字串是在堆疊中的第一個複本之後方法會清除複製和屬性會顯示堆疊為空白。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void TrimExcess() cil managed

summary.span: 如果該數目小於目前容量的 90%，則將容量設為 中項目的實際數目。

span.span: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the , if that number is less than 90 percent of current capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用記憶體降到最低集合的額外負荷如果沒有新的項目會加入至集合。This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection. 重新配置及複製大型的成本不過，可能相當大，因此方法不執行任何動作，如果清單是在多個容量的 90%。The cost of reallocating and copying a large can be considerable, however, so the method does nothing if the list is at more than 90 percent of capacity. 這可避免產生大型的重新配置成本相對較小的改善。This avoids incurring a large reallocation cost for a relatively small gain. 這個方法是 O (`n`) 運算，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 若要重設設為初始狀態，呼叫方法之前呼叫方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling method. 修剪空白設定的容量預設容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool TryPeek([out] !T& result) cil managed
Public Function TryPeek (ByRef result As T) As Boolean
.method public hidebysig instance bool TryPop([out] !T& result) cil managed
